Grrrr, that guy is trying again to turn the Demon King back into a human..."},{"lineNumber":259402,"originalJapaneseLine":"追い返してくれるわとサテラが出て行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera says, 'I'll drive them back,' and leaves."},{"lineNumber":259403,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは無反応だが、学者が指示","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance is unresponsive, but the scholar gives instructions."},{"lineNumber":259404,"originalJapaneseLine":"たとえ魔王のお子さんでも魔王に敵対する存在です、みなさん迎撃を","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if they are the Demon King's children, they oppose him. they heal their wounds and move on."},{"lineNumber":259423,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだまだ、この程度の障害でへばる訳にはいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Not yet, they can't afford to falter from obstacles of this level."},{"lineNumber":259424,"originalJapaneseLine":"先はまだ長いぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"The road ahead is still long."},{"lineNumber":259425,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルと火炎書士が現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel and a flame sorcerer appear."},{"lineNumber":259426,"originalJapaneseLine":"早く戻って読書したい、悪いけど火傷して泣きながら下山してもらうわよ","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to go back quickly and read; sorry, but you'll have to go down the mountain crying from burns."},{"lineNumber":259427,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール達がいった後、倒れたハウゼルを介抱する火炎書士","translatedEnglishLine":"After Yell and the others leave, the flame sorcerer tends to the fallen Hauzel."},{"lineNumber":259428,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにある子達、とんでもなく強い","translatedEnglishLine":"Those kids are unbelievably strong."},{"lineNumber":259429,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間越えてますね","translatedEnglishLine":"They've surpassed humans, haven't they?"},{"lineNumber":259430,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの頃のランスより強い","translatedEnglishLine":"Stronger than Rance was back then."},{"lineNumber":259431,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、今のランス、魔王ランスには勝てないわねとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But they can't beat the current Rance, Demon King Rance, or so they say..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が・・声が聞こえる、ゲイマルクの声が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... can hear a voice, Geimark's voice...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再生していくゲイマルク・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geimark is regenerating...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者は殺せないのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't the hero be killed...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールの選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell's choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択　消滅させたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice: I want to annihilate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、ゲイマルクを可哀相に思う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell feels sorry for Geimark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死なせてあげたい、消滅させてほしい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants to let him die, to be wiped out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と考えて居ると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he thinks this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か・・再生していたゲイマルクがまた消えていきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason... the regenerating Geimark fades away again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者にはエールが何かしたからという感じには見せません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To others, it doesn't look like Yell did anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、なんでだろうという感じくらいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They just have a feeling like 'huh, I wonder why'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の場合は、ゆっくり再生していくが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other cases, it slowly regenerates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かまっている必要は無いので先に進みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to pay attention, so we move on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはコーラを出してもいいです。出さなくてもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, you may offer cola. Or you may not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の居城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King's Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスがけだるい感じでいる、側にビスケッタさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Rance is feeling listless, Biscetta-san is by his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、魔人ハウゼル、魔人シルキィ、魔人リズナ、魔人レイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Beings Saizel, Hauzel, Silky, Rizna, Rei

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物元帥学者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Marshal Scholar

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが柱の陰から魔物隊長あたりから書状を受け取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san receives a letter from around the monster captain, from behind a pillar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアメージング城に人間の侵入者が現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human intruders have appeared in this Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徘徊勇者ゲイマルクを倒し、ドラゴンエリアを突破してきています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have defeated the roaming hero Geimark and broken through the Dragon Area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、人間共がまた懲りずに挑んできたのか、魔王様が好みそうな女はいそうかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera: Have the humans come to challenge us again, unrepentant? Is there a woman the Demon King might like?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鴨葱はいつでも歓迎だ、魔王様が楽しんで頂ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sitting ducks are always welcome; the Demon King will enjoy it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、若く見目麗しい女性は何名かいるそうです、ただ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, there are some young and beautiful women, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入者の方々の多くはランスのお子さんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many of the intruders are children of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの姫リセット様、リーザス王子ザンス様、ＪＡＰＡＮ国主乱義様・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Reset of Kala, Prince Zans of Rizas, Lord Rangi, ruler of JAPAN...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、リセットがいるのか、ぐぬぬぬ、あいつめまた魔王様を人間に戻そうと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, Reset is here? Grrrr, that guy is trying again to turn the Demon King back into a human...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追い返してくれるわとサテラが出て行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera says, 'I'll drive them back,' and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは無反応だが、学者が指示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is unresponsive, but the scholar gives instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たとえ魔王のお子さんでも魔王に敵対する存在です、みなさん迎撃を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if they are the Demon King's children, they oppose him. Everyone, intercept them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王化が進んでおり、少しぼーっとした感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His demon king transformation has progressed; he looks a little dazed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊衝動に耐えているので意識が曖昧な雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is holding back destructive urges, so his consciousness seems vague.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達の事を聞いても、ふーん、そうか程度、聞こえてはいるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked about the children, he just responds, 'Hmm, I see,' as if he hears them but doesn't absorb it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭には入ってきてない感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems not to register in his mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道を塞ぐように現れたの魔人ＤＤ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Being DD appears, blocking the path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王が再び覚醒されるのが近づいてきた、私の事を認めて下さるようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's reawakening approaches; he will come to acknowledge me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを邪魔する者はここを通す訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot allow anyone who interferes to pass here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに山を登っていくと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continuing up the mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長（マエリータ隊の誰かでも良い）が２００名ほどの魔物を引き連れて現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain (anyone from Maelita's squad is fine) appeared leading about 200 monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達は突撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others charge forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激戦の末、魔物軍を撃退する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a fierce battle, they repel the monster army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長、強い・・俺達は魔王様直属のよりすぐりの精鋭部隊なのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain is strong... we're the Demon King's elite unit directly under him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達も楽勝という訳ではありません、傷を治して次へ進みます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others are not exactly having an easy time; they heal their wounds and move on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ、この程度の障害でへばる訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not yet, they can't afford to falter from obstacles of this level.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先はまだ長いぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The road ahead is still long.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルと火炎書士が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauzel and a flame sorcerer appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く戻って読書したい、悪いけど火傷して泣きながら下山してもらうわよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to go back quickly and read; sorry, but you'll have to go down the mountain crying from burns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達がいった後、倒れたハウゼルを介抱する火炎書士
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Yell and the others leave, the flame sorcerer tends to the fallen Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにある子達、とんでもなく強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those kids are unbelievably strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間越えてますね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've surpassed humans, haven't they?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの頃のランスより強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stronger than Rance was back then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、今のランス、魔王ランスには勝てないわねとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But they can't beat the current Rance, Demon King Rance, or so they say...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が・・声が聞こえる、ゲイマルクの声が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... can hear a voice, Geimark's voice...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再生していくゲイマルク・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geimark is regenerating...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者は殺せないのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't the hero be killed...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールの選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell's choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択　消滅させたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice: I want to annihilate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、ゲイマルクを可哀相に思う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell feels sorry for Geimark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死なせてあげたい、消滅させてほしい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants to let him die, to be wiped out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と考えて居ると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he thinks this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か・・再生していたゲイマルクがまた消えていきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason... the regenerating Geimark fades away again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者にはエールが何かしたからという感じには見せません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To others, it doesn't look like Yell did anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、なんでだろうという感じくらいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They just have a feeling like 'huh, I wonder why'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の場合は、ゆっくり再生していくが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other cases, it slowly regenerates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かまっている必要は無いので先に進みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to pay attention, so we move on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはコーラを出してもいいです。出さなくてもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, you may offer cola. Or you may not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の居城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King's Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスがけだるい感じでいる、側にビスケッタさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Rance is feeling listless, Biscetta-san is by his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、魔人ハウゼル、魔人シルキィ、魔人リズナ、魔人レイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Beings Saizel, Hauzel, Silky, Rizna, Rei

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物元帥学者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Marshal Scholar

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが柱の陰から魔物隊長あたりから書状を受け取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san receives a letter from around the monster captain, from behind a pillar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアメージング城に人間の侵入者が現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human intruders have appeared in this Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徘徊勇者ゲイマルクを倒し、ドラゴンエリアを突破してきています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have defeated the roaming hero Geimark and broken through the Dragon Area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、人間共がまた懲りずに挑んできたのか、魔王様が好みそうな女はいそうかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera: Have the humans come to challenge us again, unrepentant? Is there a woman the Demon King might like?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鴨葱はいつでも歓迎だ、魔王様が楽しんで頂ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sitting ducks are always welcome; the Demon King will enjoy it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、若く見目麗しい女性は何名かいるそうです、ただ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, there are some young and beautiful women, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入者の方々の多くはランスのお子さんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many of the intruders are children of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの姫リセット様、リーザス王子ザンス様、ＪＡＰＡＮ国主乱義様・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Reset of Kala, Prince Zans of Rizas, Lord Rangi, ruler of JAPAN...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、リセットがいるのか、ぐぬぬぬ、あいつめまた魔王様を人間に戻そうと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, Reset is here? Grrrr, that guy is trying again to turn the Demon King back into a human...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追い返してくれるわとサテラが出て行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera says, 'I'll drive them back,' and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは無反応だが、学者が指示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is unresponsive, but the scholar gives instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たとえ魔王のお子さんでも魔王に敵対する存在です、みなさん迎撃を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if they are the Demon King's children, they oppose him. Everyone, intercept them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王化が進んでおり、少しぼーっとした感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His demon king transformation has progressed; he looks a little dazed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊衝動に耐えているので意識が曖昧な雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is holding back destructive urges, so his consciousness seems vague.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達の事を聞いても、ふーん、そうか程度、聞こえてはいるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked about the children, he just responds, 'Hmm, I see,' as if he hears them but doesn't absorb it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭には入ってきてない感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems not to register in his mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道を塞ぐように現れたの魔人ＤＤ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Being DD appears, blocking the path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王が再び覚醒されるのが近づいてきた、私の事を認めて下さるようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's reawakening approaches; he will come to acknowledge me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを邪魔する者はここを通す訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot allow anyone who interferes to pass here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに山を登っていくと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continuing up the mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長（マエリータ隊の誰かでも良い）が２００名ほどの魔物を引き連れて現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain (anyone from Maelita's squad is fine) appeared leading about 200 monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達は突撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others charge forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激戦の末、魔物軍を撃退する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a fierce battle, they repel the monster army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長、強い・・俺達は魔王様直属のよりすぐりの精鋭部隊なのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain is strong... we're the Demon King's elite unit directly under him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達も楽勝という訳ではありません、傷を治して次へ進みます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others are not exactly having an easy time; they heal their wounds and move on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ、この程度の障害でへばる訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not yet, they can't afford to falter from obstacles of this level.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先はまだ長いぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The road ahead is still long.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルと火炎書士が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauzel and a flame sorcerer appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く戻って読書したい、悪いけど火傷して泣きながら下山してもらうわよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to go back quickly and read; sorry, but you'll have to go down the mountain crying from burns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達がいった後、倒れたハウゼルを介抱する火炎書士
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Yell and the others leave, the flame sorcerer tends to the fallen Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにある子達、とんでもなく強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those kids are unbelievably strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間越えてますね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've surpassed humans, haven't they?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの頃のランスより強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stronger than Rance was back then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、今のランス、魔王ランスには勝てないわねとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But they can't beat the current Rance, Demon King Rance, or so they say...
